modName: Bloodborne Font Replacer Standalone - Skyrim - By Setvi
summary:
BFRS will add a Bloodborne font replacer, Augusta, as a standalone one, for Skyrim.
The .RAR file come into .ESP and BSA version for an easy test/install/uninstall purpose.
It's not a port from Vagabond/Somevagrant, it's my own version done as a .ESP/BSA files.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#9fc5e8][size=4][b][i]BFRS will add a Bloodborne font replacer, Augusta, as a standalone one, for Skyrim.
[/i][/b][/size][/color][color=#9fc5e8][size=4][b][i]The .RAR file come into .ESP and BSA version for an easy test/install/uninstall purpose.
[/i][/b][/size][/color][color=#9fc5e8][size=4][b][i]It's not a port from Vagabond/Somevagrant, it's my own version done as a .ESP/BSA files.
[/i][/b][/size][/color][color=#9fc5e8][size=4][b][i]Credits & thanks to:
[/i][/b][/size][/color][size=4][color=#9fc5e8][b][i]FromSoftware[/i][/b][/color]
[/size][b][i][color=#9fc5e8][size=4]dafont.com
[/size][/color][/i][/b][color=#9fc5e8][size=4][b][i]____________
Thanks, Setvi.
My others mods:
